name: Infinirail
description:
Infinirail 

[EDIT: 2-7-2022 found my first bug. Upgrading on the online version not always works, so made this also a downloadable game]

Play as a Railer, supplying goods and people down the infinite Rail always going downstream.

Learn about the best places to buy goods and where to offer your services.
Keep all parts in perfect condition , expand your train to score more points. 
Become the most succesful Railer!

Just make sure you don't run out of coal or break down!

Made for the Reset 64 C64 Craptastic 2022 4K Game competition. 

All code, graphics and music by Goerp (c) 2022 

Additional testing by Commocore

Html embedded emulator by James (@uniquename654, http://level4.jojati.com/) via http://lvllvl.com

-------- very short instructions -------------

Play by using the keyboard.

Commands are shown when pulled in a station, use the first key of the command. Sometimes additional input is necessary. Confirm with 'Y', abort with 'RUN/STOP'.

Quickstart just to get you going:

Buy up to a few 100 coal ('C' key).
Buy a Ore or Wood cart ('B' followed by '1' or '2' respectively)
Load that cart ('L' followed by the position in the train, here '2', confirm with 'Y')
Travel to the next station with 'T', confirm with 'Y'

More detailed instructions later (here or found on the disk, which will be added to this page)
